ascend_skill.desc:
At the start of battle, grant Oath to 1 random ally.
At the end of Yukimi's action, grant a shield equal to 24% of Yukimi's Defense to an ally with Oath.
*Only 1 ally can have Oath at a time.
ascend_skill.name: Scales of Fairness

ascend_skill.desc: When an ally has Oath, increase their Defense by 15%.
ascend_skill.name: Legal Proceedings

ascend_skill.desc: When an ally with Oath takes an action, gain 1 Blessing stack.
ascend_skill.name: Law-Abiding Spirit

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Sword of Condemnation and Sacral Glow by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Right Person Right Place

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Grant 2 Blessing stacks to all allies.
ascend_skill.name: Legal Qualifications

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Absolute Judgment and Thief Tactics by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Execution of Justice

ascend_skill.desc: Increase damage by 10% for Yukimi and allies with Oath. Increase Bless damage by 2% for each Blessing stack on Yukimi and allies with Oath (up to 20%).
ascend_skill.name: Extenuating Circumstances

highlight_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 284.1%/313.2%/295.8%/324.9% of Yukimi's Defense. Also increase party's Defense by 20% of Yukimi's Defense (up to 657/725/684/752) for 2 turns.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 88.0%/97.1%/91.6%/100.7% of Yukimi's Defense. Grant 1 Blessing stack to Yukimi and allies with Oath.
normal_skill.name: Sword of Condemnation

normal_skill.desc:
Grant a shield to 1 ally besides self equal to 47.2%/47.2%/49.2%/49.2% of Yukimi's Defense + 1344/1635/1547/1838, and increase target's Defense by 35% of Yukimi's Defense (up to 1112/1226/1158/1272).
Also, decrease target's damage taken by 20% once. Lasts for 2 turns. Grant 2 Blessing stacks, and grant target Oath for 2 turns.
normal_skill.name: Sacral Glow

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 117.1%/129.1%/121.9%/133.9% of Yukimi's defense.
When Yukimi or an ally with an Oath gain Blessing stacks, gain 1 Gavel stack.
When this skill is used after Gavel reaches 2 stacks, spend all Gavel stacks. For each Gavel stack spent, increase party's damage by 4.9%/5.4%/5.1%/5.6% for 1 turn, and grant a shield to party equal to 14.9%/16.5%/15.5%/17.1% of Yukimi's Defense for 2 turns.
normal_skill.name: Absolute Judgment

passive_skill.desc:
When an ally has Oath, increase their damage by 7% for every 1500 of Yukimi's Defense (up to 21.0%).
(If Defense is less than 1500, increase damage by a percentage).
passive_skill.name: Cross-Examination

passive_skill.desc: At the end of Yukimi's action, grant a shield equal to 69.0% of Yukimi's Defense to allies below 30% HP, and grant 1 Blessing stack. Blessing lasts 2 turns. This effect activates once per battle.
passive_skill.name: Urgent Matter
